ModMetaData.name: [Aerocraft Framework]Helicopters and Planes
ModMetaData.author: Asieruso23 and Asierus24
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/EEVrGqY.gif[/img]
This mod will add some aircrafts from my other mod ([SRTS Expanded] Aircrafts and Bombs) to be usable with the Aerocraft Framework mod.
At the moment only 1 helicopter and 1 airplane area added for testing.
[b]Contents of version 0.2: [/b]
-Added AH1C helicopter. -Added F-16 Fighting Falcon -2 Researchs needed for unlock the aircrafts.
-AH1C armaments: 2 rocket launchers and a frontal machinegun. (needs 2 pilots) -F-16 Fighting Falcon armaments: 2 AGM launchers and a frontal machinegun. (need 1 pilot)
[b]Requires: [/b] Aerocraft Framework https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2959802157
[b]Future plans: [/b] I will expand in the future with more techs,aircrafts,helicopters,aircraft weapons and sounds as i learn how the framework works.
My main mod from where this takes aircrafts: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2164607079
report any issues.
